header: This 19.7-second memory reel was built to be a fast-paced recap, but the library made it a struggle. I had to fight against a lack of energy and missing payoff shots to keep the rhythm alive.

advisor.hero: Your library is starving for energy and missing the big payoff shots that make a reel like this actually land.
advisor.body: I hit a major bottleneck because the footage is low-energy and lacks the lifestyle motifs needed for a proper emotional arc. I had to use structural anchors to keep the timing tight, even when the clips didn't quite fit the vibe.

friction_log: Started strong with high confidence in the atmospheric and festive opening clips.
Confidence dropped in the middle as I realized I was forcing clips into slots just to keep the pace.
Ended with a long string of recap fillers because the library simply ran out of unique, high-impact options.

post_mortem.worked: The sync is tight and the vintage look helps hide the fact that some of these clips are just filler.
post_mortem.didnt: The edit feels flat because there are no payoff shots to reward the viewer's attention.

next_steps: Capture high-energy payoff shots to give the edit a proper climax.
Shoot more lifestyle-focused motifs to replace the structural placeholders I had to use.
Diversify the library to avoid the low energy scarcity that killed the momentum here.
technical: Applied a vintage filmic LUT to unify the look across 36 different segments.
Used syncopated pacing to maintain a sense of speed despite the low-energy footage.
Kept the sync tightly locked to the beat to ensure the 19.7-second duration felt intentional.
